name: Space Cruiser (Zergeese)
description:
Hello Captain, please help us. We require your navigational expertise to avoid all the asteroids and land safely to planet Earth/Mars.

This game was made using Unreal Engine 4.26

Assets used

Icarus Spaceship : https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/free-3ds-model-ship-space-spaceship/892602

Earth and Mars Textures from NASA

Skybox Space Texture : https://pixabay.com/photos/stars-night-sky-milky-way-darkness-1246590/?download
